trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法可讓您新增及移除個別控制項的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法來新增或移除集合中的所有控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is a member of the collection by passing the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>集合的成員會藉由傳遞至控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: To get the index value of the location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> in the collection, pass the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的位置的索引值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>在集合中，以便將控制項傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: The collection can be copied into an array by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以複製到陣列，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of the first occurrence of the specified by the key parameter, if found; otherwise, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定名稱的項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>具有指定名稱。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中移除指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>被移除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>，所有後續的控制項都移一個位置，集合中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法或移除所有控制使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>物件加入集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>移除<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.
